stanzas.text:
When I think of where I’ve been
And the pit you found me in
I’ve come a long, long way dear Lord
I know it’s true
But one thing I surely know
I have a long way yet to go
Before I reach that place
I’m longing for in you

There’s a place Lord I’m longing for in thee
And to find this place means all the world to me
‘Twill be worth anything You put me through
Just to reach that place
I’m longing for in thee.

At the dawning of each day
Let me look to you and pray
for your perfect will
In everything I do
Tell me when and where to go
And the seed you’d have me sow
That I may reach that place
I’m longing for in you.

There are mountains yet to climb
Before this place in you I’ll find
And I’m sure that many trials
I’ll go through
But each test I overcome
Will make me more like your dear son,
And help me reach that I’m place
I’m longing for in you

He came down from heaven to save us
O what pain and shame
He suffered here
Mockingly they hailed him
On a cross thy nailed him
That is why his name is so dear.

Above every name is the name of Jesus
Above every name is the name of Jesus
Above every name is the name of Jesus
Every knee shall bow
Every tongue confess
That Jesus is Lord of all.

When in prayer I whisper it softly
At the throne of grace it is the key
Angels love to hear it
Hell and demons fear it
Name of power and victory

Li te soti nan syèl vin sove-n
O ki gran doulè ke-l te pote
Anpil te moke li, e yo te klouwe li
Se sa-k fè nom li si dous.

Pi wo tout lòt nom se le nom de Jezi
Pi wo tout lòt nom se le nom de Jezi
Pi wo tout lòt nom se le nom de Jezi
Tout jenou flechi, tout lang konfese
Jezu-Kris se Senyè.

Lè-m kanpe devan twòn de gras li
Pou-m priye nan nom mèvèye sa
Zanj yo renmen tande-l
Satan kouri pou li
Nom-k plen ak pouvwa e viktwa.

Alive, alive, alive forevermore
My Jesus is alive, alive forevermore
Alive, alive, alive forevermore
My Jesus is alive.
Sing hallelujah, sing hallelujah
My Jesus is alive forever more
Sing hallelujah, sing hallelujah
My Jesus is alive.

O Lord I want to take this time to be thankful
For all you’ve done in my life
I lay down, awake, and go through my day
All these times
you’re simply there protecting me.

All these times you have worked in my favor
All these times you’ve interceded for me
All these times, you’re simply there
Taking care of me
Jesus, I want to take this time
To say thank you Lord.

Jezi m’ta renmen pran tan sa
Pou-m remèsye-w
Pou tout sa ou fè nan lavi mwen
M’al kouche, m’leve, e-m fè tout aktivite-m
Tout tan sa ou sèlman la w’ap pwoteje-m

Tout tan sa w’ap aji an favè mwen
Tout tan sa w’ap entèsede pou mwen
Tout tan sa ou sèlman la
W’ap pran swen mwen
Jezi mwen vle pran tan sa
Pou-m di-w mèsi Senyè.

Eske-w pa kontan vre Jezi sove-w
Eske-w pa kontan vre li ba-w la verite
Li mete ou nan kò li
Se li menm ki tèt ou
Li wete-w pami mò yo
L’mete-w pami vivan.

Aren’t you glad that Jesus remenberded you ?
Aren’t you glad that
Jesus brought you to the truth?
Brought you to the body of which he is the head
Brought you to the living
Out from among the dead.

I’m glad, He laid his hand on me
So glad, He laid his hand on me
I was blind, but now I see
Since Jesus laid his hand on me.

Mwen te pèdi nan peche
Men Jezi jwenn mwen
Mwen te mouri kounye a m’vivan
O glwa e alelouya
Jezi se Wa dè wa.

M’kontan Kris te met men-l sou mwen
M’kontan Kris te met men-l sou mwen
Mwen te avèg, kounye a mwen wè
Depi Jezi te met men-l sou mwen.

One day I lost my way, but no one cared
I searched for happiness, but found despair
Then Jesus spoke to me, revealed to me my sin
“I’ll heal your broken heart if I may enter in

A broken heart I gave a worthless thing
An empty life was all that I could bring
Then Jesus filled my life with love divine
He healed my broken heart
And now I know he’s mine

Have you been wondering why you’re alone?
Does God seem far away, you doubt his love
Now Christ is at the door
He sees a heart that’s torn
His blood was shed for you, to give you life a new

Amazing grace shall always be my song of praise
For it was grace that bought my liberty
I do not know just how he came to love me so
He looked beyond my faults and saw my needs.

I shall forever lift my eyes to Calvary
To view the cross where Jesus died for me
How marvelous
The grace that bought my falling soul
He looked beyond my faults and saw my need.

If not for grace my soul would be a drifting ship
With no safe harbor from the angry waves
But calvary’s cross shines brightly
Through the darkest storm
And just in time his mercy rescues me.

As the deer panteth for the water
So my soul longeth after Thee
You alone are my heart's desire
And I long to worship Thee.

You alone are my strength, my shield
To you alone may my spirit yield
You alone are my heart's desire
And I long to worship Thee.

You're my friend and You are my brother
Even though You are a king
I love You more than any other
So much more than anything.

Only you loved me so
So much I can’t understand
Only you are there in the darkest night
Even in the deepest sea you’re there
Your great love help me to hold on.

God sent his son they called him Jesus
He came to love, heal and forgive
He lived and died to buy my pardon
An empty grave is there to prove my savior lives

Because he lives I can face tomorrow
Because he lives all fear is gone
Because I know he holds the future
And life is worth the living just because He lives

Behold the lamb, behold the lamb
Slain from the foundation of the world
For Jeus crucified, oh holy sacrifice
Behold the lamb of God
Behold the lamb

Crown him, crown him
worthy is the lamb
Praise him, praise him
Heaven and earth bless him.

Moses led God’s children
Forty years he led them
Through the cold
And through the night
Tho they said, “let’s turn back”
Moses said, “keep going
Canaan land is just insight.”

There will be no sorrow
There in that tomorrow
We will be there by and by
Milk and honey flowing
That is where I’m going
Canaan land is just insight.

Though we walk through valleys
Though we climb high mountains
We can not give up the fight
We must be like Moses
We must keep on going
Canaan land is just in sight.

Moyiz mennen pèp la, karantan-l mennen yo
Nan tan frèt e nan tout nwit
Yo di ann retounen, Moyiz di an avan
Kanaan la devan nou.

La pap gen soufrans ankò
Nan matine sa kote-n prale pou tout tan
Lèt ak myèl ap koule, kote nou prale
Nan kanaan selès la

Ke-n mache nan vale, ke-n monte mòn byen wo
Nou pa dwe sispann batay
Nou dwe fè kou Moyiz, ann kriye an avan
Kanaan la devan nou.

Change me o God
From the creature that I am
Renew my mind by the washing of the word
Restore my soul to you
Don’t leave me as I am
Lord I want to change, to change.

Chanje mwen Senyè, chanje mwen
Lespri sen anvayi kò sa
Chanje mwen
M’pa bezwen konnen sa mwen va fè
Transfòme anndan mwen
Fè-m mache nan volonte-w
Chanje mwen.

My life seemed in vain
‘til one wonderful day
When the clouds were darkest
The Lord came my way
He said: “Child, I sought you
for you’ve been astray”
With his hand he led me to his great highway.

Chosen in God for redemption’s plan
Chosen in him I’ll follow the lamb
Who loved me and saved me
And taught me to pray
And said I’ll go with you
To the end of the way.

Closer to you Lord, closer I pray
Help me draw closer to your will today
It doesn’t matter what others may do
I want to draw closer to you.

Consider the lilies
They don’t toil nor spin
And there’s not a king
with more splendor than them
Consider the sparrows
They don’t plant nor sow
But they’re fed by the Master
who watches them grow.

He is Lord, He is Lord
He has risen from the dead
He is Lord
Every knee shall bow
Every tongue confess
That Jesus Christ is Lord.

Mèsi pou solèy la kap klere kò a
Mèsi pou pawòl ou kap nouri nanm mwen
Ou ban-m yon verite ke-m pat gen avan
Ou se yon bon sovè,sen e veritab.

Li se Senyè, li se Senyè
Li te leve nan lamò, li se Senyè
Tout jenou flechi, tout lang konfese
Jezi-kris se Senyè.

Here I am, humbling myself
Under your mighty hands
I’ve recognized if I do your will
you’ll bless me ‘til the end dear Lord
Through out my many faults and all my trials
You have never left me 
’ve realized if I’m still here you have chosen me.

Dear Lord I bow before your throne
With all my burdens
There is no way for me to hide all of my problems
Although I’ve tried, never succeed
All of my efforts would be in vain
When I’m alone in despair you see them.

It’s by your grace, dear Lord
I’m here living a clean life
Give me more courage and holy spirit
To help me overcome some day
I’ll never worry for what’s ahead of me
In this road that I trout
I’ve realized if I’m still here
You have chosen me.
